dc_title_s: New map of America divided into its kingdoms, states, governments, and other subdivisions : from the latest observations.
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially.  Prime meridian: London.  Outline color.  Includes a table in lower left corner listing the possessions of Great Britain, France, Spain, the Dutch, Denmark and Portugal.|54 x 56 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:30,000,000|General Map Collection
